Title: Acceptance
Plot: As "Nathan" starts displaying new powers, he has visions of an incident from his past involving a young girl and decides to investigate. Hiro tries to save a co-worker and learns a truth about himself. Tracy tries to regain her old life and job.
GuestStars: Bruce Boxleitner, Ray Park, Dawn Olivieri, Akihiro Kitamura, Saemi Nakamura, Jayson Blair, Swoosie Kurtz
